data.eml:eml: A new species of Apolochus (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Gammaridea, Amphilochidae) in Maryland coastal bays, USA with notes on its abundance and distribution

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morales-Nunez, Andres G., Chigbu, Paulinus (2016): A new species of Apolochus (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Gammaridea, Amphilochidae) in Maryland coastal bays, USA with notes on its abundance and distribution. ZooKeys 571: 81-104, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.571.7440, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.571.7440
